Package schedulemanager.service

Class TrackingService

java.lang.Object
schedulemanager.service.TrackingService
public class TrackingService extends Object
Service for managing actual activity sessions with validation.

Provides operations for creating, updating, and deleting actual sessions, including validation to prevent overlapping sessions.

  • Method Details

    • createSession

      public ActualSession createSession(ActualSession session) throws SQLException
      Creates a new actual session with validation (no overlaps allowed).
      Parameters:
      session - the session to create
      Returns:
      the created session with generated ID
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails (overlap, invalid time range)
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • updateSession

      public void updateSession(ActualSession session) throws SQLException
      Updates an existing actual session with validation.
      Parameters:
      session - the session to update
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if validation fails
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • getSessionsForDate

      public List<ActualSession> getSessionsForDate(LocalDate date) throws SQLException
      Gets all actual sessions for a specific date.
      Parameters:
      date - the date
      Returns:
      list of sessions for the date
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

      public ActualSession getSession(Long sessionId) throws SQLException
      Gets an actual session by ID.
      Parameters:
      sessionId - the session ID
      Returns:
      the session, or null if not found
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

Schedule Manager - Time management and task tracking application
